Content:
This is for a 98 Kawasaki ninja zx6r. With 80000 kilometres.
There was always a rattling noise coming from the area where the clutch is especially at 5-6k rpm. It stops almost immediately when I pull it in.
But when i was riding on the highway all of a sudden the noise became really bad and I lost quite a bit of power. It still worked but now it sounds like a diesel tractor when i start it.



it isnt the plates themselves because it makes the noise with them removed aswell. Could it be the damping springs or the bearing?
